scripts.say: Eagle Union - Outside NY Harbor, present
Commander, the defenders are still holding out. Looks like we've made it in time...
One minute and thirty-five seconds ahead of schedule. Revising combat rating assessment.
If it isn't the "Tester" this time. Looks like you bunch really are throwing the kitchen sink at us.
Since you finally decided to show your face, it'd be a pity to not smash it in first.
Eagle Union heavy cruiser, Baltimore. Standard displacement: 14,500 tons. Three triple 8-inch guns. Anti-air specialization.
Looks like you've done your homework already. But you'd better add "the one who's going to smash your face in" to that list.
You're the one who's commanding the Siren forces here, aren't you?
... Once we defeat you, we will guide NY City and Commander down the true path.
And once I defeat you, we'll all be safe again.
You are nothing but weapons, instruments of death and destruction.
You would even strike down your allies without hesitation if you were ordered to.
How ironic it is that tools of death would speak of justice. Do you even know what justice is?
Run your mouth all you want, but I have my convictions.
Justice is simple enough ⁠— it's about using your power to protect your loved ones!
